ValidationRule.description: Prevents certain updates when the Billing Contract field is checked
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISNEW() = False && Billing_Contract__r.Lock_Billing_Contract_Lines__c = True && ( ISCHANGED( Unit_Price__c ) || ISCHANGED( Quantity__c ) || ISCHANGED( Invoice_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Error: The Billing Lines are Locked, you cannot change the unit price, quantity, or invoice date
